Aktivität Next Meeting at TU Berlin auswählen
Free work - no meeting at TUB -

We would like to mention that we are currently conducting a small study in the BOL on the perception of traffic noise and that it would be great if some of you could show up next Friday (12.00) to take part in the experiment (and also receive a small compensation). We could then also use the time to talk about your project work and your audio recordings preparation, if desired.
